### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE drug_reports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  patient_id UUID NOT NULL,
  report_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  efficacy_rating INT NOT NULL,
  safety_rating INT NOT NULL
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE drug_reports SET efficacy_rating = 4 WHERE report_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE DrugData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_name VARCHAR(255),
  efficacy_score INT,
  safety_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE PatientData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  drug_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES DrugData(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ReportData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  patient_id INT,
  efficacy_score INT,
  safety_score INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES PatientData(id)
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE DrugData SET efficacy_score = 8 WHERE id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE DrugStudyData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_name VARCHAR(255),
    patient_id INT,
    study_date DATE,
    efficacy_score INT,
    safety_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE PatientData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE StudyResults (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    study_id INT,
    patient_id INT,
    result_details TEXT,
    conclusion TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE DrugInformation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_name VARCHAR(255),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
    usage_instructions TEXT,
    side_effects TEXT
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE DrugStudyData SET efficacy_score = 5 WHERE id = 1;
